tests.title: Admission Deadlines/Admission Deadlines-L1
tests.fullTitle: Botium Test-Suite Admission Deadlines/Admission Deadlines-L1
tests.context:
{
  "title": "Conversation Log",
  "value": "#me: Admission Deadlines
#bot: Due to impaction, our University only accepts applications during its initial filing periods. The application filing periods for Fall are: October 1 â€“ November 30. 
To complete your admissions application, you must submit:
 
âœ”ï¸ Your application a year prior to starting on Cal State Apply.
âœ”ï¸ Application fee of $70 or fee waiver. This fee is nonrefundable and may not be transferred to another term.
âœ”ï¸ Official high school transcripts or college transcripts
âœ”ï¸ Residency Documents (if requested)

For more information regarding Admissions and Enrollment deadlines, please refer to our website: http://kommunicate.io/blog "
}

tests.title: Cost to Attend/Cost to Attend-L1
tests.fullTitle: Botium Test-Suite Cost to Attend/Cost to Attend-L1
tests.context:
{
  "title": "Conversation Log",
  "value": "#me: Cost to Attend
#bot: âœ”ï¸ Tuition and other college expenses are charged at varying rates depending on your unit enrollment, options, and degree type. 

âœ”ï¸ Because of the number of variables involved in each specific case, there is no way to estimate your expenses or if financial aid, grants or scholarships will cover part or all costs. 

âœ”ï¸ I recommend trying to estimate costs using the Net Price Calculator or starting an expenses spreadsheet while referencing the Tuition and Fees Site on the student financial services department website "
}

tests.title: Freshman & First-Time/Freshman & First-Time-L1
tests.fullTitle: Botium Test-Suite Freshman & First-Time/Freshman & First-Time-L1
tests.context:
{
  "title": "Conversation Log",
  "value": "#me: Freshman & First-Time
#bot: To apply as first time freshmen, you must meet the following requirements:
 
âœ”ï¸ Be high school graduate or equivalent
 
âœ”ï¸ Complete the fifteen-unit comprehensive A-G course pattern of college preparatory study with grades of 'C' or better.
 
âœ”ï¸ Meet the eligibility index (local area students held to minimum eligibility index. Non-local students are held to higher index).

Please refer to our website https://www.kommunicate.io/ for further information regarding First-year Students admissions. "
}
